keyPolicies.policyTitle: STOP BREXIT AND REMAIN IN THE EU
keyPolicies.policyDescription: This is a vote to stand up and be counted. Vote for me and I will vote for a People’s Vote and to stop Brexit.
After 9 years of Conservative-Lib Dem Austerity, our NHS is underfunded and under threat. Only Labour will protect our NHS.
Climate change is a clear and present threat. I will fight to take urgent action to cut carbon emissions and clean up our air.
Build more social and affordable housing and stop 'no fault' evictions for renters.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The 2017 General Election Result in Putney was very close. Only a vote for Fleur Anderson will stop the Conservatives in Putney this time round.

issues.brexitEurope: This is a vote to stand up and be counted. Vote for me and I will vote for a People’s Vote and to stop Brexit.

housing.content: Build more social and affordable housing and stop 'no fault' evictions for renters.

leaflet.personalStatement: Fleur has led international development campaigns around the world and runs a local community centre.

contactInformation.address: FREPOST Putney Labour, 35 Felsham Road SW15 1AY
